topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: I NEED alcohol. I'm not an alcoholic but considering the crap I put up with, I need somethig to help me unwind lest I end up in an insane asylum. Also why can't cheap booze just be honest with it's advertising? They say things like "exceptional smoothness" "bold flavors" and such. Is that really what you care about? Why not just a label that honestly just says "this will get you drunk for 1.50"?

topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5355c40863687260dea90100#post_5355c40863687260dea90100
He's a dime a dozen otaku that seem to be blinded by nostalgia and thinks that if any anime came out after the 90's isn't worth watching. A bit pretentious at times even though some of his criticisms are spot on. He's the type that starts bleeding from the eyes if you so much as insinuate that a series might be better than Cowboy Bebop.
